sec.title: Access to operating positions and servicing points

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: Access systems shall be provided to the operator's station and to routine maintenance points. Access systems shall comply with ISO 2867.

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: Minimum access dimensions shall comply with ISO 2860.

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: When doors, windows and flaps are designed to open and close freely, and can be blown or unintentionally fall closed creating a hazard, it shall be possible to secure them in both closed and open positions. For surface applications, wind force while drilling, as presented in Annex B, should be considered.

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: The maintainability guidelines of ISO 12510 should be used.

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: If provided, anchor devices for personal fall protection equipment shall comply with ISO 14567.
